Love the twists in the steps! 
Very timely that our boys look like royal warriors, the twists of the dance steps are dedicated to South Korea's Foundation Day today, also known as the "Festival of the Opening of Heaven", Gaecheon-gol,these are the knees-to-the-ground “Big Bows” (큰절) or deep bows that are reserved for special occasions, and Koreans do this to show deep gratitude.
